trans-unit.target: તે કેવી રીતે કામ કરે છે
trans-unit.note: How it works page title
Consent by user page

trans-unit.source: No need to input personal information. We are using unique ID, allocated to you when installing an app.
trans-unit.target: અંગત માહિતી ને ઇનપુટ કરવાની જરૂર નથી. અમે યુનિક આઈડીનો ઉપયોગ કરી રહ્યા છીએ, જે એપ્લિકેશન ઇન્સ્ટોલ કરતી વખતે તમને ફાળવવામાં આવેલ છે.
trans-unit.note: How it works page step 1 description 1

trans-unit.source: A contact with another app user for longer than 30 min in total, within a radius closer than 2m on average is recorded as "Close Contact".
trans-unit.target: અન્ય એપ્લિકેશન વપરાશકર્તા સાથે નો સંપર્ક કુલ 30 મિનિટથી વધુ સમય માટે, સરેરાશ 2m થી વધુ ત્રિજ્યાની અંદર "ક્લોઝ કોન્ટેક્ટ" તરીકે નોંધવામાં આવે છે.
trans-unit.note: How it works page step 2 description 1

trans-unit.source: Bluetooth/Exposure Notification needs to be turned on to record close contact. Please go to the next page to turn it on.
trans-unit.target: નજીકનો સંપર્ક રેકોર્ડ કરવા માટે બ્લુટુથ ને ચાલુ કરવાની જરૂર છે. કૃપા કરીને તેને ચાલુ કરવા માટે આગળના પાના પર જાવ.
trans-unit.note: How it works page step 4 description

trans-unit.source: This app uses Exposure Notification / Bluetooth signals to determine if you are near another contact tracing app user. Select 'Always Allow' to set up Bluetooth.
trans-unit.target: આ એપ્લિકેશન એક્સપોઝર નોટિફિકેશન / બ્લુટુથ સિગ્નલનો ઉપયોગ કરે છે કે તમે અન્ય કોન્ટેક્ટ ટ્રેસિંગ એપ્લિકેશન વપરાશકર્તાની નજીક છો કે નહીં. બ્લુટુથ ને સુયોજિત કરવા માટે 'હંમેશા પરવાનગી' પસંદ કરો.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified if you have been exposed to someone who reported a positive COVID-19 result.
trans-unit.target: જો તમને કોઈ એવા વ્યક્તિ સાથે સંપર્ક થયો હોય કે જેણે હકારાત્મક COVID-19 પરિણામ ની જાણ કરી હોય તો તમને સૂચિત કરવામાં આવશે.
trans-unit.note: exposures comment

trans-unit.target: કૃપા કરીને નિદાન ઓળખકર્તા દાખલ કરો
trans-unit.note: Notify Other Page Code Input

trans-unit.source: The test date helps the app know when you may have been contagious and notify the right people of potential exposure.
trans-unit.target: ટેસ્ટની તારીખ એપ્લિકેશનને એ જાણવામાં મદદ કરે છે કે તમે ક્યારે ચેપી હોઅને સંભવિત સંપર્કના યોગ્ય લોકોને સૂચિત કરો.

trans-unit.source: Only those who have been exposed will receive a notification.
trans-unit.target: જે લોકો ને ખુલ્લા પાડવામાં આવ્યા છે તેમને જ સૂચના મળશે.

trans-unit.source: The unique test identifier that came with your COVID-19 test must be used to verify your positive test result.
trans-unit.target: તમારા COVID-19 ટેસ્ટ સાથે આવેલો અનન્ય ટેસ્ટ ઓળખનાર તમારા હકારાત્મક ટેસ્ટ પરિણામની ચકાસણી કરવા માટે ઉપયોગ થવો જ જોઇએ.
કૃપા કરીને નિદાન ઓળખકર્તા ને પ્રદાન કરો

trans-unit.source: Please enable Exposure Notifications before submitting a diagnosis.
trans-unit.target: નિદાન રજૂ કરતા પહેલા એક્સપોઝર સૂચનાઓ ને સક્રિય કરો.

trans-unit.source: Your diagnosis cannot be verified at this time to be submitted.
trans-unit.target: તમારું નિદાન આ સમયે જમા કરાવવા માટે ચકાસી શકાતું નથી.

使用中止

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to reset all the data?
trans-unit.target: શું તમે ખરેખર બધી માહિતીને પુનઃસુયોજિત કરવા માંગો છો?

trans-unit.source: All settings and data have been deleted. Please restart the application.
trans-unit.target: બધા સુયોજનો અને માહિતી કાઢી નાખવામાં આવી છે. મહેરબાની કરીને કાર્યક્રમ ફરી શરૂ કરો.

trans-unit.source: Please provide a valid Diagnosis ID
trans-unit.target: કૃપા કરીને માન્ય નિદાન ID પ્રદાન કરો

trans-unit.source: Please provide a valid Test Date
trans-unit.target: મહેરબાની કરીને યોગ્ય ચકાસણી તારીખ પૂરી પાડો

trans-unit.source: Would you like to register positively later?
trans-unit.target: શું તમે પછીથી હકારાત્મક નોંધણી કરવા માંગો છો?

trans-unit.source: When you run the application , it will generate and store an anonymous ID on each smartphone. This application does not acquire any information related to privacy such as phone number and location information.
trans-unit.target: જ્યારે તમે એપ્લિકેશન ચલાવો છો ત્યારે તે દરેક સ્માર્ટફોન પર એક અનામી આઇડી જનરેટ કરશે અને સંગ્રહ કરશે. આ એપ્લિકેશન ફોન નંબર અને સ્થાન ની માહિતી જેવી ગોપનીયતા સાથે સંબંધિત કોઈ પણ માહિતી પ્રાપ્ત કરતી નથી.
trans-unit.note: How it works page step 1 description 2

trans-unit.source: While the application is running, each other's smartphone will record each other's anonymous IDs for the past two weeks. Records older than 2 weeks will be deleted and each anonymous ID will be changed periodically to protect privacy.
trans-unit.target: એપ્લિકેશન ચાલી રહી છે ત્યારે એકબીજાનો સ્માર્ટફોન છેલ્લા બે અઠવાડિયાથી એકબીજાના અનામી આઈ.ડી.ની નોંધ કરશે. 2 અઠવાડિયાથી જૂના રેકોર્ડ્સ કાઢી નાખવામાં આવશે અને દરેક અનામી ઓળખપત્રને ગોપનીયતાની સુરક્ષા માટે સમયાંતરે બદલવામાં આવશે.
trans-unit.note: How it works page step 2 description 2

trans-unit.source: Other users regularly get a list of anonymous IDs of positive ones. After the acquisition, the contact record recorded on the smartphone will be matched. If the result of the match is a heavy contact, we will notify your smartphone and inform you of the necessary actions that you would like us to cooperate with.
trans-unit.target: અન્ય વપરાશકર્તાઓ ને નિયમિત પણે પોઝિટિવ આઇ.ડી.ની યાદી મળે છે. અધિગ્રહણ બાદ, સ્માર્ટફોન પર રેકોર્ડ કરવામાં આવેલા કોન્ટેક્ટ રેકોર્ડને મેચ કરવામાં આવશે. જો મેચનું પરિણામ ભારે સંપર્ક હોય, તો અમે તમારા સ્માર્ટફોનને સૂચિત કરીશું અને તમને જરૂરી પગલાં વિશે જણાવીશું કે જેનો તમે સહકાર આપવા માંગો છો.
trans-unit.note: How it works page step 3 description

trans-unit.source: Contact with positive testers in the last 14 days
trans-unit.target: છેલ્લા 14 દિવસમાં પોઝિટિવ ટેસ્ટર્સ સાથે સંપર્ક

trans-unit.source: Help protect your family and friends by anonymously registering test results.
trans-unit.target: જો તમે નવા કોરોના સાથે હકારાત્મક હો, તો કૃપા કરીને તમારી આસપાસના લોકોની સુરક્ષા માટે હકારાત્મક નોંધણીમાં સહકાર આપો.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
周りの人達を守るために匿名での陽性登録へのご協力をお願いいたします。

trans-unit.source: One more person using this app is one more step towards containing the spread of COVID-19.
trans-unit.target: આ એપ્લિકેશન એટલી અસરકારક છે કે ઘણા લોકો તેને ઇન્સ્ટોલ કરે છે, તેથી કૃપા કરીને તમારી આસપાસના લોકો સાથે એપ્લિકેશન ને શેર કરો.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
本アプリは多くの方にお使いいただくほど効果を発揮します。
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
使い方

接触の記録方法

trans-unit.target: જો ચેપ લાગવાનું નક્કી થયેલ હોય
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
感染していると判定されたら
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
記録の停止／削除

trans-unit.source: When you run this app, each smartphone will generate a random code. No personal information and no location information including GPS data is collected.
trans-unit.target: જ્યારે તમે આ એપ ચલાવો છો, ત્યારે દરેક સ્માર્ટફોન જનરેટ થશે અને એક કોન્ટેક્ટ કોડ હશે. આ ઉપરાંત, આ એપ ટેલિફોન નંબર અને સ્થાનની માહિતી જેવી વ્યક્તિગત માહિતી સાથે સંબંધિત કોઈ પણ માહિતી પ્રાપ્ત કરતી નથી.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
アプリを実行した際に、各スマートフォンで接触符号を生成して持ちます。氏名・電話場号などの個人情報やGPSなどスマートフォンの位置情報を使うことはなく、記録されることもありません。
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
記録される接触の条件

trans-unit.source: If smartphones running this app are in close contact (within 1 meter for 15 minutes or more), this is recorded as a close contact.
trans-unit.target: 15 મિનિટ અથવા તેનાથી વધુ સમય માટે 1 મીટરની અંદર અન્ય એપ્લિકેશન વપરાશકર્તાઓ સાથે સંપર્ક ને "સંપર્ક" તરીકે નોંધવામાં આવે છે.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
1メートル以内、15分以上の他のアプリユーザーとの接触は「接触」として記録されます。

trans-unit.target: સંપર્ક જાણકારીને રેકોર્ડ કરી રહ્યા છીએ
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
接触情報の記録

trans-unit.source: Phones in close contact exchange their random codes. This information will not be used until either user registers positive test results with this app. The close contact history will be erased after 14 days. Note: The code changes regularly to protect your privacy.
trans-unit.target: આ સમયે, સંપર્ક કરનાર વ્યક્તિનો સંપર્ક કોડ એપ્લિકેશનમાં રેકોર્ડ કરવામાં આવે છે. જ્યાં સુધી કોઈ પણ વપરાશકર્તા પોઝિટિવ ન આવે ત્યાં સુધી સંપર્ક માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ નહીં થાય. સંપર્ક ઇતિહાસ 14 દિવસ પછી ભૂંસી નાખવામાં આવશે. *સંપર્ક કોડ નિયમિત પણે બદલાય છે.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
このとき、接触した相手の接触符号の記録をアプリに行います。どちらかの利用者が陽性の登録を行うまでは接触の情報は利用されません。接触の履歴は14日後に消去されます。 ※接触符号は定期的に変わります。
アプリの設定へ

trans-unit.source: From app settings, you can enable/disable Bluetooth and notifications, stop using the app and delete close contact history.
trans-unit.target: From app settings, you can enable/disable Bluetooth and notifications, stop using the app and delete close contact history.
trans-unit.note: アプリの設定から、Bluetoothの有効／無効、通知の有効／無効、アプリの使用中止と履歴の削除を行うことができます。

trans-unit.source: The app will notify you, if you were in close contact with COVID-19 positive user.
trans-unit.target: The app will notify you, if you were in close contact with COVID-19 positive user.
trans-unit.note: 接触した人の中に新型コロナウィルスの陽性登録された人がいた場合、スマートフォンにプッシュ通知が届きます。

trans-unit.source: You can check the number of your close contacts from the home screen.
trans-unit.target: You can check the number of your close contacts from the home screen.
trans-unit.note: 最近の接触件数の確認へはホーム画面からも移動することができます。

trans-unit.source: You can check the list of close contact dates and receive guidance on what to do if you have symptoms of the disease.
trans-unit.target: You can check the list of close contact dates and receive guidance on what to do if you have symptoms of the disease.
trans-unit.note: 接触があった日付の一覧を確認できます。また適切な連絡先をお知らせします。
通知
ホーム画面

trans-unit.source: If you had close contact with a COVID-19 positive user
trans-unit.target: If you had close contact with a COVID-19 positive user
trans-unit.note: 陽性者との接触があった場合
PCR検査により新型コロナウィルスの感染が確認された場合。

trans-unit.source: Public health authorities will issue you a "processing number".
trans-unit.target: Public health authorities will issue you a "processing number".
trans-unit.note: 保健所等公的機関から登録用の「処理番号」が発行されます。

trans-unit.source: Register by entering provided processing number into this app
trans-unit.target: Register by entering provided processing number into this app
trans-unit.note: 本アプリを用いて処理番号の登録を行います。

trans-unit.source: Smartphones that were in close contact with your smartphone within the last 14 days will receive notifications.
trans-unit.target: Smartphones that were in close contact with your smartphone within the last 14 days will receive notifications.
trans-unit.note: あなたと14日以内に接触した人のスマホアプリに通知が届きます。（1m以内、15分以上）

trans-unit.source: Only randomly generated codes from device are used when sending notifications. No personal information is used.
trans-unit.target: Only randomly generated codes from device are used when sending notifications. No personal information is used.
trans-unit.note: 通知される情報は端末の接触符号のみです。それ以外の、氏名など個人情報や位置情報が送られることはありません。

trans-unit.target: No close contacts with COVID-19 positive users

trans-unit.source: Please keep practicing 'New Lifestyle' recommended by the government.
trans-unit.target: Please keep practicing 'New Lifestyle' recommended by the government.
trans-unit.note: 引き続き「新しい生活様式」の実践をよろしくお願いいたします。
アプリを周りの人に知らせる

trans-unit.source: Thank you for registering your test results!
trans-unit.target: Thank you for registering your test results!
trans-unit.note: 陽性のご登録をいただきありがとうございました

trans-unit.source: Registration is anonymous. You do not have to enter your name or any other personal information. No information regarding location of close contact is recorded.
trans-unit.target: Registration is anonymous. You do not have to enter your name or any other personal information. No information regarding location of close contact is recorded.
trans-unit.note: 登録は匿名で行われ、氏名や連絡先など個人が特定される情報を登録する必要はありません。また、接触した場所の位置情報が記録や通知されることもありません。

trans-unit.note: 規約に同意して次へ

件

trans-unit.source: If you have possible COVID-19 symptoms, contact healthcare organizations using the form below or by phone. Depending on the symptoms, you will be advised to take a COVID-19 test.
trans-unit.target: If you have possible COVID-19 symptoms, contact healthcare organizations using the form below or by phone. Depending on the symptoms, you will be advised to take a COVID-19 test.
trans-unit.note: 現在の症状などを、入力フォームまたはお電話にて、行政機関にご連絡ください。内容に応じて、PCR検査センター等への受診を案内します。

trans-unit.source: Please take a screenshot of this screen. You may be asked to provide it during diagnosis.
trans-unit.target: Please take a screenshot of this screen. You may be asked to provide it during diagnosis.
trans-unit.note: 受診の際などに必要となる場合があるため、本画面のスクリーンショットの保存をお願いいたします。

trans-unit.source: Confirmed close contacts with COVID-19 positive users
trans-unit.target: Confirmed close contacts with COVID-19 positive users

利用規約
プライバシーについて

trans-unit.source: No personal information such as your name or phone number is collected. No geolocation data including GPS data is collected.
trans-unit.target: No personal information such as your name or phone number is collected. No geolocation data including GPS data is collected.
trans-unit.note: 氏名・電話番号などの個人情報や、GPSなどスマートフォンの位置情報を使うことはなく、記録されることもありません。

trans-unit.source: All data is encrypted and saved locally on your smartphone. All data is automatically deleted after 14 days. Your movements are not tracked in any way by government agencies or third parties.
trans-unit.target: All data is encrypted and saved locally on your smartphone. All data is automatically deleted after 14 days. Your movements are not tracked in any way by government agencies or third parties.
trans-unit.note: 接触の記録は、暗号化され、あなたのスマートフォンの中にのみ記録され、14日後に自動的に削除されます。行政機関や第三者が暗号化された情報を利用して接触歴を把握することはありません。

trans-unit.source: You can stop recording close contacts with other users anytime by changing app settings or deleting the app.
trans-unit.target: You can stop recording close contacts with other users anytime by changing app settings or deleting the app.
trans-unit.note: 接触の記録はいつでも止めることができます。アプリ内の設定を無効にするか、アプリを削除してください。
利用規約へ
プライバシーについて
通知をご利用いただくために

trans-unit.source: Please turn on notifications to be notified when you had close contacts with COVID-19 positive users.
trans-unit.target: Please turn on notifications to be notified when you had close contacts with COVID-19 positive users.
trans-unit.note: 本アプリで接触の通知をご利用いただくために、本アプリのプッシュ通知を有効にしてください。
有効にする
あとで設定する
通知をご利用いただくために
メニュー
登録する

trans-unit.source: Please enter a process code issued to you by "Health Center Real-time Information-sharing System on COVID-19 (HER-SYS)".
trans-unit.target: Please enter a process code issued to you by "Health Center Real-time Information-sharing System on COVID-19 (HER-SYS)".
trans-unit.note: 新型コロナウイルス感染症者等情報把握・管理支援システム（HER-SYS）から発行された処理番号を入力してください。

trans-unit.source: Users who were in close contact with you within the past 14 days will be notified. Registration is anonymous. You do not have to enter your name or any other personal information. No information regarding location of close contact is recorded.
trans-unit.target: Users who were in close contact with you within the past 14 days will be notified. Registration is anonymous. You do not have to enter your name or any other personal information. No information regarding location of close contact is recorded.
trans-unit.note: 過去14日間に本アプリであなたと接触した履歴のある人に通知が行きます。登録は匿名で行われ、氏名や連絡先など個人が特定される情報を登録する必要はありません。また、接触した場所の位置情報が記録や通知されることもありません。

trans-unit.source: How to receive a process code
trans-unit.target: How to receive a process code
trans-unit.note: 処理番号の取得方法
陽性情報の登録
次へ

trans-unit.source: The app recognizes close contacts between smartphones running this app.
trans-unit.target: The app recognizes close contacts between smartphones running this app.
trans-unit.note: 本アプリをスマートフォンに設定した人どうしの接触を記録します。

trans-unit.source: When tested positive for COVID-19, you can anonymously register the test result in this app.
trans-unit.target: When tested positive for COVID-19, you can anonymously register the test result in this app.
trans-unit.note: 新型コロナウィルスに陽性と判定されたら本アプリに匿名で登録することができます。

trans-unit.source: If you have been in close contact with a user who tested positive, the app notifies you of potential infection and provides guidance to protect your health.
trans-unit.target: If you have been in close contact with a user who tested positive, the app notifies you of potential infection and provides guidance to protect your health.
trans-unit.note: 最近接触した人の中に陽性登録した人がいたら、通知と適切な行動をお知らせします。
このアプリでできること
このアプリでできること
有効にする
あとで設定する

trans-unit.source: Please turn on Bluetooth to start recording close contacts with other users.
trans-unit.target: Please turn on Bluetooth to start recording close contacts with other users.
trans-unit.note: 本アプリで接触検知をご利用いただくために、スマートフォンのBluetooth通信を有効にしてください。
技術的な詳細について
接触検知をご利用いただくために
接触検知をご利用いただくために
から
8桁の処理番号を入力してください

trans-unit.source: The processing number will be notified to your mobile phone number or e-mail address registered in the new coronavirus infectious disease information and management system (hereinafter "management system").
trans-unit.target: The processing number will be notified to your mobile phone number or e-mail address registered in the new coronavirus infectious disease information and management system (hereinafter "management system").
trans-unit.note: 新型コロナウイルス感染症等情報把握・管理システム（以下「管理システム」）に登録されたあなたの携帯電話番号又はメールアドレスに、処理番号が通知されます。

trans-unit.source: When you enter this processing number into the terminal, the terminal will make an inquiry via the notification server to the management system as to whether the processing number has been issued to you.
trans-unit.target: When you enter this processing number into the terminal, the terminal will make an inquiry via the notification server to the management system as to whether the processing number has been issued to you.
trans-unit.note: あなたがこの処理番号を端末に入力することにより、端末から通知サーバーを経由して管理システムに対し、処理番号があなたに対して発行されたものか否かの照会が行われます。

trans-unit.source: The management system will respond to the notification server as to whether the transaction number referred to was issued to you.
trans-unit.target: The management system will respond to the notification server as to whether the transaction number referred to was issued to you.
trans-unit.note: 管理システムは、通知サーバーに対し、照会された処理番号があなたに対して発行されたものか否かについて回答します。

trans-unit.source: If you reply that the transaction number was issued to you, other users' terminals will be provided with the daily key recorded on your terminal.
trans-unit.target: If you reply that the transaction number was issued to you, other users' terminals will be provided with the daily key recorded on your terminal.
trans-unit.note: 処理番号があなたに対して発行されたものである旨の回答が行われた場合は、他の利用者の端末に、あなたの端末に記録された日次鍵が提供されます。

trans-unit.source: If you have been in contact with you within 14 days, you will know that you may have been contacted without any information that can identify you personally.
trans-unit.target: If you have been in contact with you within 14 days, you will know that you may have been contacted without any information that can identify you personally.
trans-unit.note: 14日以内にあなたと接触の状態となったことのある方は、あなた個人を識別可能な情報がない状態で、接触した可能性がある旨を知ることができます。
